data.md:MetaData: Silicate enrichment studies of Lanvéoc, Mesocosm experiment No. 2/Bay of Brest in June and July 2004

Putting and filling the mesocosms on day -1 between 08:30h and 10:30h, adjusting the water volume in each sac on day 0 between 09:00h and 10:00h, sampling each given day between 08:00h and 09:00h. The pontoon is 20m long, depending on the tides the true water depths are between 7m (close to the beach) and 9m (far from the beach).
